radar: Hovland tees off Sunday at Pebble Beach's legendary coastal layout in the AT&T Pro-Am, one of the PGA Tour's most scenic stops. Arsenal face tricky west London trip to Brentford Thursday as they defend their six-point lead at the Premier League summit.
Norwegian biathlon and cross-country stars face packed Olympic schedules through next week with multiple medal chances across sprint, distance, and relay events on home-continent snow.
